RECORD_SELECTION.TITLE: Click anywhere on the list item to select. Click on bulk select item icon again to exit bulk select mode.

BULK_ACTION_MODAL.REGENERATE_PAYMENT_FOOTER_TEXT: Regenerate payment for all selected records
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.CHANGE_EXECUTION_DATE_FOOTER_TEXT: Change execution date of all selected records
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.APPROVE_ERROR_TEXT: Only records in 'New','Import Successful' statuses can be approved
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.REJECT_ERROR_TEXT: Only records in 'New','Import Successful' statuses can be rejected
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.REGENERATE_PAYMENT_ERROR_TEXT: Regenerate Payment action can only be done when payment message is in 'Execution Date Changed', 'Item Removed' or 'Item Deleted' status
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.CHANGE_EXECUTION_DATE_ERROR_TEXT: Execution date can be changed for payment messages in 'New', 'Import Successful', 'Item Removed', 'Item Deleted' and 'Execution Date Changed' status only
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.PAYMENT_CHANGE_EXECUTION_DATE_ERROR_TEXT: Execution date can be changed for payments in 'New' and 'Execution Date Changed' status only
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.PAYMENT_DELETE_ITEM_ERROR_TEXT: Only records in 'New' status can be deleted
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.PAYMENT_REMOVE_ITEM_ERROR_TEXT: Only records in 'New' status can be removed
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.PAYMENT_ITEMS_APPROVE_ERROR_TEXT: Only manual payment records in 'New','Import Successful' and 'Rejected' statuses can be approved
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.PAYMENT_ITEMS_REJECT_ERROR_TEXT: Only manual payment records in 'New','Import Successful' and 'Approved' statuses can be rejected
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.PAYMENT_FILES_APPROVE_CONFIRM_TEXT: Do you want to approve these record(s) -
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.PAYMENT_ITEMS_APPROVE_CONFIRM_TEXT: Do you want to approve these record(s) -
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.PAYMENT_FILES_REJECT_CONFIRM_TEXT: Do you want to reject these record(s) -
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.PAYMENT_ITEMS_REJECT_CONFIRM_TEXT: Do you want to reject these record(s) -
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.REGENERATE_PAYMENT_CONFIRM_TEXT: Do you want to regenerate payment for these record(s) -
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.PAYMENT_FILES_CHANGE_EXECUTION_DATE_CONF: Do you want to change execution date of these records
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.PAYMENT_CHANGE_EXECUTION_DATE_CONFIRM_TE: Do you want to change execution date of these records
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.PAYMENT_DELETE_ITEM_CONFIRM_TEXT: Do you want to delete these record(s)
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.PAYMENT_REMOVE_ITEM_CONFIRM_TEXT: Do you want to remove these record(s)
BULK_ACTION_MODAL.CHANGE_EXECUTION_DATE_INFO_TEXT: All items under {{ records }} are in approved status, however, this action will change the execution date of all the items under it.

MESSAGES.CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Please select execution date of today or future
